title: COTTON TRENCH COAT WITH FLORAL PRINT
desc: Long trench coat in double-layered cotton fabric with distinctive, refined all-over floral print. This model also features deep side vents and a matching belt at the front. The interior is embellished with a contrasting check motif.• Regular fit• Single-breasted button closure• Belt at the front• Side slip pockets• Side vents• Made in Italy• The model is 5' 9½" (177 cm) tall and wears a size 40
